revised_title: Investigation of Tabasheer's Optical and Physical Properties
tldr: The author, David Brewster, examines the optical and physical properties of tabasheer, a substance found in bamboo. He discovers its unique ability to become transparent when immersed in water and opake with a small amount of water. Brewster also measures its low refractive power, which is lower than any other solid or liquid, and provides a formula for computing the absolute refractive power of bodies.
